entities.name: he
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, referred to as 'he' throughout the passage.

entities.name: she
entities.description: A female character in the story, referred to as 'she' throughout the passage.

entities.name: the snake
entities.description: A large snake that attacks the protagonist.

relationships.description: The snake bites and strikes the protagonist, causing him to fall backward onto the dressing table.
She is controlling or manipulating the snake, as evidenced by its sudden movement when she points at it.
